pr_title: Drag from Attribute Editor the graph exception resolution

timeline.message: added ClassCastException catch to fix issue of dragging labels from attribute editor to graph

timeline.bodyText: @antares1470 would you be able to explain a bit more of some of the scenarios that lead to this happening "e.g. dropping a attribute label causes this"; something like that so we know why we are doing nothing? Thank you.
timeline.author: arcturus2

timeline.message: added a comment to ClassCastException explaining how it occurs
